website_summaries.verdict: Strong features give this laptop a high-end performance level that justifies a high price tag.
pros: Includes top-of-the-line features across the board, ensuring excellent performance for all types of computing work and gaming
High-end processor to yield the best possible speed
Includes a 14-inch touchscreen display with QHD+ resolution that's sharp and clear
cons: Most users cannot take full advantage of the features

customer_reviews.title: I love my Razer Blade
customer_reviews.text: I love my Razer Blade. It's the best quality of laptop that I have ever owned. I really kicked around the idea of buying a Razer for a couple of weeks. I did hours of research, read through many reviews and finally made the order. The quality is amazing. I needed something powerful so I can run both business, school, and games on the go. This has met all my needs and is so light that I'm impressed. I've owned the blade for a few months now and really feel that it's going to last me a long time. Plus it looks so sleek and feels so soft that I couldn't imagine switching it out.
customer_reviews.author: F. Devere

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully for 2 years then the motherboard completely died. Razer wants almost $1000 to repair it with only a 90 day guarantee on the repair. Searching online, the motherboard dying is a common issue and I find it ridiculous they would charge that much for a known issue with their product. For that amount of money I can purchase a similarly spec'ed laptop from a different company that's 2 years newer. I thought I was paying more for quality and reliability but apparently not. I don't think I will be purchasing a Razer again.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: This is the best. I am amazed how much better it performs ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I am amazed how much better it performs with CAD/CAM and 3d scanning. Beats the pants off all my other computers and I have many. Just think, I thought my Alien Ware system was good. Now its a huge paper weight compared to this fast-slim-mean machine. Now, understand that I am all about productivity. I have no clue how this works in the gaming world.
customer_reviews.author: warren hagen

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, but will get very hot.
customer_reviews.text: The bad: - It will get so hot, it will burn your fingers if you game for a long time. - While the resolution is huge, most applications don't behave correctly. Running Unity everything is blurry or incredibly tiny. - Will improve if you use it will external monitor, mouse, keyboard. The good: - It is very powerful, it can run every game I have. - Nice battery - Compact size Neutral: Having a touch screen on a laptop is kind of weird, not many uses.
customer_reviews.author: ernesto

customer_reviews.title: If you find it for USD 1.750 or less, is the best
customer_reviews.text: This computer just flies, everything works great and the build quality is top noch. GOOD: - Great display - Excellent build quality (including tactile keyboard) - Best specs available in that size BAD: - OK sound - Normal battery life - Very expensive (Although I bought it in a discount of USD 1.699 for 512 GB version) So good that the bad things are just normal in this category
customer_reviews.author: tolarteh

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is a great product and I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months now with no problems. It does get hot as others have commented, however, I have played for hours without any issues. I do feel that the touch screen is pointless and money could have been put elsewhere in the manufacturing of it but that is just my opinion. Overall it is a great product and I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Razer support is garbage. Left mouse button on the touchpad stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: Lackluster performance. Overpriced. Razer support is garbage. Left mouse button on the touchpad stopped working less than a year after purchase. Replacement parts are not available. You have to send it to them for repair. I'll never buy another Raver product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great resolution for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great resolution for gaming. Lightweight, you can carry this baby everywhere. Good graphics, it will give you good performance to play the latest games. Cons: One of the bigest problems that i have with some laptops (including this one) is that the ventilation of the device is facing the ground. This results in the laptop gaining more heat during the gaming sessions. There is a point in which the laptop consumes the battery energy even tough is connected to the power source.
customer_reviews.author: richard paul flores

customer_reviews.title: Great display, TONS of power
customer_reviews.text: Great display, TONS of power. It does run hot but I've found that it doesn't bother me so long as it isn't sitting on my lap. Wish it had and ethernet port and was about $700 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Satyagrah4

customer_reviews.title: fab product fab seller. amazing experience. fixed network issue.
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 amazing item. Amazing seller. Had the normal network card issue that is known. Changed the registry and fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: C&S

customer_reviews.title: Issues
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift, like the product, has had some issues though. First had to be sent back did not work, then the second started having issues about a year after
customer_reviews.author: Shona Daily-Germino

customer_reviews.title: It's a really good laptop. The 3K screen is stunning
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good laptop. The 3K screen is stunning, and it has great performance. The GPU is a little weak to power the 3K screen at high settings, but that is what the newer models are for. The main bottleneck is the "high speed" internet at my house, a stunning 180 Kilobytes per second. This laptop could be so much more responsive if I had better. Other than that, It is a great laptop for the price of 1,100 that I got it at.
customer_reviews.author: Lorin

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop. Incredibly fast
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Incredibly fast, smooth, and beautiful. Battery life gets a little short when gaming, and the laptop gets quite hot during serious gaming. You'll definitely want a fan or cooler of some sort with the laptop. The only reason I don't give 5 stars is because my charger stopped working and replacement chargers are 130$ and razer is currently out of stock on them.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Coonen

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad points.
customer_reviews.text: Very Good!! product but..... the touchscreen makes a lot of light reflections, from my point of view it could be a great feature an optional to have the possibility to choice the same display but without touch. On the other hand, the support is not so good if you have a issue outside of EEUU, they are not thinking like a international company (bios update, recovery Cd or Pendrive, drivers etc..).
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Girardi

customer_reviews.title: This computer fans a lot! If you want power ...
customer_reviews.text: This computer fans a lot! If you want power you can get a computer for the same price as a desktop a lot faster, but if you want a fast gaming laptop and your ok with fanning just a tiny bit. Then get it!
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Periut

customer_reviews.title: The gaming performance has been very good and the form factor has made it easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: The Razer Blade 14" QHD fits my needs well. I wanted a small portable laptop that could also be used for gaming. The gaming performance has been very good and the form factor has made it easy to carry around. My only complaint is that the RAM is only 8GB and cannot be upgraded.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Kish

customer_reviews.title: The computer is was nice but it had too many problems
customer_reviews.text: The computer is was nice but it had too many problems. It kept shutting off when i was trying to play 7 days to die and i tried my best to keep it cool but still shut off. It got hot ass hell above the keyboard and couldn't play the games i wanted unless i put everything on low settings.
customer_reviews.author: sir buys alot

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, perfect condition. This computer has a beautiful display, lightning fast, and is perfect for any gaming. I use it for MMO's and it outperforms my friends desktop when we play. Only thing I'd recommend is a cooling pad, it heats up rather quick, and gets really hot.
customer_reviews.author: jarred hays

customer_reviews.title: Good performance. Just a few comments (it is supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: Good performance. Just a few comments (it is supposed to be a gaming computer) Doesn't have Ethernet entry, few USB entries and only HDMI entry (needed a DVI entry for 144Hz monitors). Need a game booster to get proper perfomance
customer_reviews.author: Andre Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, fast, hot
customer_reviews.text: Superb design and performance. Incredible resolution. But yes, it gets hot, very hot, when running games. Would suggest hooking it up to a keyboard and mouse and placing it on a laptop cooling stand to mediate the temperature. Also noteworthy is the relatively small and light power pack.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over a year, still works like I just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop. This is my first PC after using ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Laptop. This is my first PC after using macbooks for over 8 years and I love it. So fat very happy with the laptop in terms of performance. the only thing i wish it was a bit better is the battery life. I get 4 hours of usage which is not that bad for a laptop with these specs.
customer_reviews.author: Omid Fatouraee

customer_reviews.title: beautiful screen, powerful
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, beautiful screen, powerful, touch. Only downside is it gets quite noisy when actively gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Savdog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop. Plays all my games maxed out
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop. Plays all my games maxed out. Screen is GORGEOUS. Keyboard feels great. HDMI port makes it easy to use Steam Big Picture mode. Comes with all the bells and whistles. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brycee L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Seller and Razor proved to be a fantastic support at the end. Both receive my recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schaumann

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son as a high school graduation ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as a high school graduation present. This laptop is built so well, and performs so well, I'm tempted to drop my mac and make the switch. I'm actually envious of my son's laptop. Didn't see that coming.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Harris

customer_reviews.title: Product is okay
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my cousin in India. He said the battery does not take charge after 5 months .
customer_reviews.author: Sameer

customer_reviews.title: battery defect
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it, since after using it for 24 days. It had a battery defect and amazon has sent me a replacement. Hopefully this does not give me anymore problems =\ other than that, its an awesome laptop.
customer_reviews.author: John Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Great all around laptop
customer_reviews.text: It's got everything that's great about Macs (design, keyboard, construction, feel, smooth operation, etc) and everything that's great about PC's (usefulness, etc). And it's great for gaming to boot! Perfect computer for any student or adult or anybody! Crisp display, great color, etc etc
customer_reviews.author: Barret Seagroves

customer_reviews.title: I love this computer
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. I only wish the keyboard had page down and up without having to use the ctrl + arrow keys.
customer_reviews.author: Jacynda Earl

customer_reviews.title: I love it soooooooo much
customer_reviews.text: I love it soooooooo much! you mush have it if you are looking forward a gaming laptop, I LOVE AMAZON I LOVE MY RAZERRRR!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clovis M.

customer_reviews.title: The best computer I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best computer I've ever owned, match it with the webroot antivirus and your golden. Runs witcher 3 on medium which is really good ~longtime MacBook Pro user
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great graphics and resolution is better than MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Looks - It's a black MacBook Pro. Great graphics and resolution is better than MacBook Pro. Cons: charger could have been magnetic like the MacBook.
customer_reviews.author: jaffer

customer_reviews.title: I love razer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 512g monster months ago. No issues ever and so far so good. Beat my old Asus ROG in every aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Park

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The performance os great bit ot comtinusly warms up and the charger stops working. Bad quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Rocha R.

customer_reviews.title: I expected a quality product for the price paid. ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected a quality product for the price paid. This gaming laptop has been nothing but a nightmare for me. Issues with the software, screen flickering constantly and no games will run properly off of steam. They either will only show about 20% of screen or are extremely small. The warranty customer service is atrocious as well. Please stay away from this machine and save yourself the cash and headache.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast, super well built and all my friends are jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS LAPTOP - FAULTY AND POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself some trouble and look elsewhere. The laptop itself is great. Lightweight and high performance, all in one package. However, I am now on my third return/repair, and see no end in sight. Razer staff have been okay in getting me a replacement in a reasonable amount of time, but the laptop just.keeps.breaking. I don't know if its the design or just faulty parts, but this is not an issue you should have to deal with. That said, I am now attempting to get a refund and they will not refund it. DO NOT BUY THIS LAPTOP. You will regret it. TLDR: this laptop is just not stable enough.
customer_reviews.author: demrd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best laptop I've used, image quality, very fast, the happiness
customer_reviews.author: fabrice diasparra

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues mar a laptop I want to love.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop, when it works, is very good. Amazing screen, good video card, overall quite zippy. The problem has to do with quality control. I have had to RMA this laptop twice to the manufacturer. The first laptop I was sent, the battery didn't work. The second laptopm v completely died after less than two week's of light use. I now await my third replacement. To their credit, Razer customer support is quick on the reply and does a good job keeping me up to date on the status of repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel I Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Both Failed in the 1st month Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this item. Ordered Qty 2 both failed in less than a month even after sending them for repaire never worked as expected. Avoid Avoid Avoid or buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: Yacoub Abbas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very awesome and sick gaming laptop !!!!
customer_reviews.author: ACOOSA

customer_reviews.title: In general it's an awesome machine. There is a buzzing noise sometimes
customer_reviews.text: In general it's an awesome machine. There is a buzzing noise sometimes, which goes away after 15-20 minutes. It totally should not happen on a 2k laptop. In the end I decide to return it to Amazon just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Quynh Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Windows 8. 1 is the only negative relating to ...
customer_reviews.text: Windows 8.1 is the only negative relating to this laptop. Everything else is a dream
customer_reviews.author: Chris van Rooyen

customer_reviews.title: unexpected shutdown, overheating issues !
customer_reviews.text: I just got my laptop today.First it gave me 2 times error during the installation the windows. The third time i successfully installed it.Then i download a game (League of Legends) while i was playing the game the device suddenly shut itself. After couple of min later (while the laptop cooled down) i was able to reopen the laptop.I'm going to return the device immediately !
customer_reviews.author: HALUK

customer_reviews.title: When running video high demanding programs like games then the Nvidia card takes control and the ...
customer_reviews.text: if you connect an external monitor via the HDMI port it will be controlled by the Intel integrated graph card, very low quality. When running video high demanding programs like games then the Nvidia card takes control and the game will look good but browsers, outlook, or any other regular program on the external monitor will look blurry
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Canepa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: battery only last abt 2 hours with fully charged and PLUGED IN.
customer_reviews.author: Wutian Sun

customer_reviews.title: broke down on 92nd day
customer_reviews.text: Fan is making weird noises and now Told by Razer support I have to send it in for repair. Can't return with amazon because already 92days from purchase. return is 90days only :( This is the worst thing I've bought in amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Pinoy Shipper.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only two things I don't like about this laptop are the touchpad and a lack wired internet option
customer_reviews.author: pikachucollector

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I have twin 13 year old boys. One son wanted this 14" Touchscreen Gaming Laptop while my other son wanted the Pro 17 inch Gaming Laptop We got each what they wanted for their birthday and they are ecstatic.
customer_reviews.author: Reader from Long Island, NY

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this computer in a while since I got it last year. And the reason is because it almost always has a problem such as " working on features ;100% complete; Don turn off your computer. " this is the second time it's happened. It never got out of that blue screen. I had to recover system settings for this. I tried calling system support but they're not available 24/7. Another problem is caps lock continues not to work even though it had worked for a time. Then there are times when the left mouse button doesn't work. I mean come on, for a computer I spent 2800 dollars on, these most basic problems should not occur.
customer_reviews.author: meister007

customer_reviews.title: otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: it will be a little when playing games, otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: Xu S.

customer_reviews.title: great grap card and cpu
customer_reviews.text: great grap card and cpu, ez for big game, but problem is, its like a lapoven, and burn itself down
customer_reviews.author: Huang Huang

customer_reviews.title: Gaming Precision, Creative Performance
customer_reviews.text: Perfect laptop for any purpose. Light-weight and handy. Love the black Finish. Its a must buy if you are looking for a nice laptops which is not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bronx

product_meta.title: Razer Blade RZ09-01161E32-R3U1 Touchscreen Gaming Laptop (Windows 8, Intel Core i7-4702HQ, 14" LED-lit Screen, Storage: 512 GB, RAM: 8 GB) Black
product_meta.description:
Capacity:512 GBThe 14-inch Razer Blade embodies Razer's continuing drive to design the world's best gaming laptops for those that need insanely powerful performance, the thinnest form factor and the highest resolution screen to game anywhere, anytime.
